ai-thi-ap7:0.3_0: Let the Elders please accept (them) from later on the mountain,
ai-thi-ap7:1.4_0: I am the best of Buddhas, the Holy Ones.
ai-thi-ap7:2.1_0: Having received it from the Sambuddha, the Awakened One,
ai-thi-ap7:2.3_0: The Teacher, emitting when he was stabilized,
ai-thi-ap7:2.4_0: granting me about the perfected ones.
ai-thi-ap7:3.2_0: you’ll go to the thirty-two places.
ai-thi-ap7:3.3_0: The thirty-six sections of the Thirty-Three
ai-thi-ap7:4.4_0: you’ll be able to do so,
ai-thi-ap7:5.2_0: having gone forth on what is given,
ai-thi-ap7:5.4_0: I’ll be quenched without a door.’
ai-thi-ap7:6.1_0: After saying this, the Sambuddha, the Awakened One,
ai-thi-ap7:7.3_0: and after giving alms food, drink,
ai-thi-ap7:8.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-thi-ap7:8.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-thi-ap7:8.4_0: this gift is the fruit of giving.
ai-thi-ap7:10.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-thi-ap7:12.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the nun Vacchagotta.
